definition.de: Der aktuelle Wert einer Währung im Verhältnis zu einer anderen
definition.en-GB: the system of money used by a country, including the value of one currency as measured against another
definition.en-US: the system of money used by a country, including the value of one currency as measured against another
definition.pt-BR: Valor de uma moeda em comparação com outra.
definition.pt-PT: Valor de uma moeda em comparação com outra.
definition.zh-Hans: 一种货币相对于另一种货币的价值
